bibl.title: Agrarian History and the Labour Organisation of Byzantine Large Estates.
Agriculture in Egypt from Pharaonic to Modern Times
bibl.author: BANAJI, Jairus

bibl.note: Introduction. - A Historiography of Abstractions. - Rural Stratification: Geouchountes, Ktetores and Ergatai. - The Case for Permanent Labour. - Restructuring in the Later Empire. - The New Estates. - The Labour Organisation of Sixth-Century Estates. - Conclusion. - Bibliography.
BANAJI Jairus, Agrarian History and the Labour Organisation of Byzantine Large Estates.
Alan K. BOWMAN and Eugene ROGAN (Edd.), Agriculture in Egypt from Pharaonic to Modern Times = Proceedings of the British Academy. 96 (Oxford, 1999) pp. 193-216.
